transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Hello
Hello ji, mai Uzair baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account mein liye.
Customer: Ji, Rehman ji kaise hai sir aap?
Executive: Bas thik hai. Hello
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir mai abhi ek aapka concern dekh raha tha ki aapne ek feedback diya tha sir IndiaMART pe.
Hello
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ji, to aapne jo feedback diya tha sir, wo kya issue aaya tha sir batayenge thoda mujhe kuch?
Customer: Kyu batayenge bhai? Kyu?
Executive: Nahi aapne feedback diya hoga abhi.
Abhi aapne feedback diya tha kya?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Nahi yaha pe mai dekh raha hu aapka feedback aaya hai sir.
To koi aapko problem ya issue create ho rahi hai sir ek baar aap mujhse discuss kijiye mai wo thik karunga aapka problem.
Customer: Aapne bola to band kar dijiye.
Executive: Nahi ye service hi band kar de aap?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Nahi wo to sir ho hi gayi hai aapki kyuki 20 November ko aapka ye expiry date tha. To 20 November ko to ye aapki expire ho gayi ab aapko renew karane ki jarurat hai. Wo aap mana kar rahe hai right?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Lekin yaha pe aapka ek concern raise hua tha jo ki hum dono ke beech mein jo baat hota uska feedback rehta hai. To aapke whatsapp pe aaya hoga wo ya fir mail pe. Mail pe aapne ye diya feedback.
Mail pe aapne kuch likh ke diya hai?
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Executive: Nahi diya. To mai ye jo aapka concern hai wo close kar raha hu. Abhi aapko koi issue to nahi hai ye bataye. Koi bhi issue, koi bhi problem koi kuch bhi janna chahte ho aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: To mai ye aapka ye aapka concern jo hai wo close kar raha hu. Aapke pass ek mail aayega. To mail pe aap mujhe feedback de dena satisfied, right?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Aap close kar dijiye bas. Khatam hi hoga.
Executive: Ha wo mai
Customer: Ha wo mai close kar de raha hu. Aapke mail pe apne dono ke beech mein jo baat hua wo uska feedback rehta hai.
Executive: Samajh gaye sir?
Customer: Wo to mai abhi close kar dunga.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Ji to mail aayega mail pe aap feedback ye kar dena jo bhi aapko.
Customer: Nahi mai mail chalane nahi aata hai humko.
Executive: Ha to ye kisne chalaya fir mail?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Ye mail kaun chala raha hai fir aapka?
Customer: Mera mail abhi koi nahi chala raha hai.
Executive: Achha thik hai to mai ye aapka concern close kar raha hu okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to close the service.

- Customer denies providing any feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the feedback process.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, concern, closing, mail
